summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bond Fund -- 1954, and the Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bonds Interest and Redemption Funds, making an appropriation for the design of Martin Luther King, Jr. Way Sidewalks Project, and providing for closure of the Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bond Fund and Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bonds Interest and Redemption Funds on completion of the project, and transferring all remaining liabilities and assets to the Arterial City Street Fund.
